features: 100% polyester (87% recycled) plain-weave fabric with exceptional breathability and abrasion resistance; microtexture creates excellent next-to-skin comfort; a PFC-free DWR finish (durable water repellent coating that does not contain perfluorinated chemicals) resists moisture
Breathable fabric (40CFM) and front-panel structure allow excess heat to escape quickly
Soft EVA brim insert for next-to-forehead comfort
Brim made of NetPlus® 100% recycled fishing nets
Lightweight performance Velcro® closure with elastic anchor for snug, active fit
Lightweight, minimal headband made with miDori™ bioSoft for added wicking and softness, and HeiQ® Fresh durable odor control for moisture and temperature management
Fair Trade Certified™ sewn, which means the people who made it earned a premium for their labor.
